TLINE.TDLINE: &USE&
·,,Sourcing types are another component of the four gicom condition
dimensions. The defined sourcing types can be used in the condition
maintenance in the AD. The sourcing type indicates the channel through
which the goods are or were purchased (for example: For deliveries to
the central warehouse the trade partner guarantees better conditions
than for a decentralized delivery, because shipment costs will be
clearly higher for him).
·,,The ID is maintained as a four-digit token of the reference type in
the table /GICOM/VM_SRCTYP. The ID must be numerical and defined as a
consecutive number. Here you also enter the identifier for the language
EN. The corresponding sourcing type is entered automatically in the
table /GICOM/SRC_TYPT with the language EN. If the sourcing type is
deleted, the entry in the text table that was generated automatically
will be deleted as well.
·,,Other texts in other languages can be created in the table
/GICOM/TSRC_TYPT. Also, the SAP table for languages is stored as F4
help.
·,,In the condition maintenance, the sourcing types entered in these
tables are stored in the F4 function for the sourcing type field.
&PRECONDITIONS&
&STANDARD_SETUP&
&ACTIVITY&
You can define the values for the fields in the below manner
Sourcing Type Title of sourcing type
A
B
&EXAMPLE&
